How Movtivated are you to QUIT smoking?(Percentage, such as 80%)
How many cigarettes did you smoke Yesterday?(Integer, such as 10)
The secret to quitting smoking is to plan and prepare
Two Mountains Stop-Smoking Program teaches you to plan and prepare your stop-smoking expedition
Introducing the Two Mountains: You have to climb these (but don\'t worry)

Two Mountains is an analogy. It is a story, a personal story. It is a narrative, written by each person trying to quit smoking. Some people will have an easier time, they will climb two smaller mountains. Some people will have a very difficult time. They will choose the highest mountains; they will think that quitting smoking is the biggest challenge that they could possibly face or imagine.

Quitting smoking can be unimaginably difficult or just mildly uncomfortable. It depends on each person individually and their mindset. If you think that quitting will be difficult, like climbing Mount Everest or the Matterhorn, then it will be exactly that difficult. If you think that it will be like climbing a smaller mountain or hill, like Mount Snowdon in Wales, then it won\'t be any more difficult than that. The secret to quitting smoking is to plan and prepare. Set your goals to climb two smaller mountains and quitting smoking will be no more difficult that these smaller expeditions.

The Two Mountains Stop-Smoking Program teaches you to plan and prepare your stop-smoking expedition and then your quit-nicotine expedition. Using psychology and technology, we are breaking your smoking habit into two easier-to-manage challenges. First, we will teach you to break the smoking habit. Second, we will teach you to beat the nicotine dependency. You can learn how to plan and prepare to summit these two mountains successfully.
I am unable to log in to the application and it shows "Incorrect account or password".
What should I do if I forget my password?
How can I change my personal information?
What should I do if the application crashes during use?
My question is not on the above list, what should I do?
Please ensure that the account and password entered are correct. If you forget your password, please use the "Forget Password" function to reset it.
Click "Forgot Password" on the login interface, follow the prompts to enter the registration email and phone number, and you can set a new password.
After logging in, enter the My Home page interface and click "My Profile" to make changes.
Please try clearing the cache or restarting the application. If the problem persists, contact the administrator to provide feedback.
You can send an email to tmpsytech@outlook.com We will reply as soon as possible.
If the required answer is not found, please send an email to contact the administrator and we will provide further assistance.
